title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.42 - Use of parkway lands
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.42 - Use of parkway lands

State Regulations

The entering upon, or the occupancy of any lands, including
any structure, facility or dwelling house thereon, is prohibited except for
photography as provided in this Part, unless expressly authorized in an
agreement with the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
